hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:The Prophet (ﷺ) cursed effeminate men (those men who are in the similitude (assume the manners of women) and those women who assume the manners of men, and he said, "Turn them out of your houses ." The Prophet (ﷺ) turned out such-and-such man, and `Umar turned out such-and-such woman

chapter.ara-name: باب إِخْرَاجِ الْمُتَشَبِّهِينَ بِالنِّسَاءِ مِنَ الْبُيُوتِ
chapter.eng-name: The dismissal of such men as are in similitude of women, from the houses
